    • Method Detail

      • startBettingRound

        public void startBettingRound()
        Description copied from interface: IGame
        create and start a new BettingRound. when called when a current bettinground is active: the current bettinground ends and a new bettinground is created, which becomes the current bettinground. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API

      • acceptBet

        public boolean acceptBet(Bet bet,
                         IGamingMachine gamingMachine)
                  throws NoCurrentRoundException
        Description copied from interface: IGame
        Accept a bet on the current betting round. determine if the betting round is finished, if so: determine the winner, notify the connected gaming machines and start a new betting round. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
        Parameters:
        bet - the bet to be made on the betting round
        gamingMachine - gamingmachine which places bet on this game.
        Returns:
        true when bet is accepted by the game, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        NoCurrentRoundException - when no BettingRound is currently active.

      • determineWinner

        public void determineWinner()
                     throws NoBetsMadeException
        Description copied from interface: IGame
        End the current bettinground & calculate the winner using the gamerules. notifiy all connected game machines of the BetResult. When no bets have been made yet, no winner can be determined. In this case, only log to the betlogging authority, and end the current bettinground. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
        Throws:
        NoBetsMadeException

      • isBettingRoundFinished

        public boolean isBettingRoundFinished()
                               throws NoBetsMadeException,
                                      BetNotExceptedException
        Description copied from interface: IGame
        determine if the right number of bets are done (determined by gamerules) to be able to calculate a winner. for calculation a winner, a true random value needs to be received from the gambling authority API. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
        Returns:
        true if all necessary bets are made in the betting round, otherwise false
        Throws:
        NoBetsMadeException
        BetNotExceptedException

      • setBettingRound

        public void setBettingRound(IBettingRound bettingRound)

        public IBettingRound getBettingRound()
